ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “This machine hasn't been working right
ever since Weapon got to it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “Hey! Yo!
Wanna buy the whole store?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “Hey! Yo!
Our weapons are the best!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “Hey! Yo!
You want weapons?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “I've got nothing to sell to you!
Come back later!”

dialogStrings:
“I've got nothing to sell to you!
Come back later!”

“Hey! Yo!
Our weapons are the best!”

“Hey! Yo!
Wanna buy the whole store?”

“This machine hasn't been working right
ever since Weapon got to it!”
